thread.title: Lord Livingstone showcases an inspiring music
thread.title_full: Lord Livingstone showcases an inspiring music - The Times of India

author: Anjana George
title: Lord Livingstone showcases an inspiring music
text:
Going effusive about the music composer RexVijayan's dedication, Anil Radhakrishna Menon said that he was elemental in giving soul to the songs.
Lord Livingstone 7000 Kandi is an upcoming fantasy film in Malayalam. Written and Directed by Anil Radhakrishnan Menon. It features 8 ensemble cast - Kunchako Boban, Sunny Wayne, Nedumudi Venu, Chemban Vinod, Reenu Mathews, Jacob Gregory, Sudheer Karamana and Bharath.
